refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Scilab uses a "GLJPanel" (a Swing OpenGL component) to display its graphics (plot3d, plot, ...). Unfortunately this component uses some high level OpenGL primitives that are not fully supported depending on the OS, Video Card, ...

There is an alternative component "GLCanvas" (AWT + OpenGL) Scilab can use to render its graphics. However, this disables some capabilities such as mixing plots and uicontrols. That's why it's not the default behavior.
